summary: A documentary uncovering the history and the making of Clive Barker's Hellraiser: Los que traen el infierno (1987) and Hellbound: Hellraiser II (1988) films.
cast: Peter Atkins|Simon Bamford|Imogen Boorman|Doug Bradley|John Cormican|Mark Coulier|Kenneth Cranham|Rory Fellowes|Christopher Figg|Clare Higgins|William Hope|Anna Lovatt|Clive Mackey|John Midgley|Oliver Parker|Geoffrey Portass|Tony Randel|Selwyn Roberts|Andrew Robinson|Simon Sayce|Oliver Smith|Robin Vidgeon|Nicholas Vince|Cliff Wallace|Karl Watkins|Barbie Wilde|David Worley
title: Leviathan: The Story of Hellraiser and Hellbound: Hellraiser II
